      • checkAvailableSpaceInThePark

        private boolean checkAvailableSpaceInThePark(java.lang.String park,
                                             int visitorsNum)
        Check available space in the park
        Parameters:
        park - the park to be checked
        visitorsNum - the amount of visitors to check
        Returns:
        true if the park have enough free space
        false otherwise

      • setSpontaneous

        public void setSpontaneous(java.lang.String ownerID,
                           java.lang.String parkName)
        This method is called from casual entry window.
        Disables the park and visit hour comboBoxs
        and sets visit time to current time.
        Then creates a ParkEntry using ownerID parkName
        by calling the createParkEntry method
        Parameters:
        ownerID - the owner ID to create ParkEntry for
        parkName - the entry's park name

      • checkIfGuideByIDAndSetFamilyCheckBox

        private ParkEntry.EntryType checkIfGuideByIDAndSetFamilyCheckBox(java.lang.String id)
        Enable or disable the family check box
        according to subscriber or guide type
        and the number of family members
        Parameters:
        id - the entry's owner ID
        Returns:
        the type of a subscriber: GUIDE or FAMILY
